data.text:
Bozkurt

Bozkurt is a city in Kastamonu, in Turkey.

GPS Coordinates of Bozkurt, Kastamonu, Turkey

Bozkurt is located on the latitude of 41.95769 and longitude of 34.01087 and has a geohash of sz2ntyjvq8qc.

Cities and Towns near Bozkurt

The nearest significant population center from Bozkurt is Abana in Kastamonu, Turkey, located 2 kilometers or 1 miles ↑ N of the city. Other locations in close proximity include Çatalzeytin (Kastamonu, Turkey) located 16 km (9 mi) → E and İnebolu (Kastamonu, Turkey) located 20 km (12 mi) ← W of Bozkurt.

In total, we found 19 cities near Bozkurt in our database.

Power Plants near Bozkurt

We found a total of 1 utility scale power plants in close proximity of Bozkurt.
